Honestly, this game is incredible. While simple on the surface, the inner workings of this game are slowly laid bare as you get more and more experience and create incredible replayability; especially over time as they add more perks, survivors, killers, and maps!

Its a fun game with regular updates and new killers that keeps things interesting.
But do not be surprised if you find bugs... There is a lot of bugs

Great game, really fun, even more so with friends. 
Stick with playing as the survivor, running and hiding for your life, deciding when is safe to grab a generator or help one of the other survivors, abandon other survivors to their deaths to finish a generator, whatever floats your boat.... or, you could stalk the survivors from afar, giving them false hope, before chasing them down and using them as bait to delay the work on the generators. Just dont camp. It ruins the fun for everyone.
This game is really fun if you play with friends
